rukus.text: Wa 'Idh Ghadawta Min 'Ahlika Tubawwi'u Al-Mu'uminina Maqa`ida Lilqitali Wa Allahu Sami`un `Alimun
Idh Hammat Ta'ifatani Minkum 'An Tafshala Wa Allahu Waliyuhuma Wa `Ala Allahi Falyatawakkali Al-Mu'uminuna
Wa Laqad Nasarakumu Allahu Bibadrin Wa 'Antum 'Adhillatun Fa Attaqu Allaha La`allakum Tashkuruna
Idh Taqulu Lilmu'uminina 'Alan Yakfiyakum 'An Yumiddakum Rabbukum Bithalathati 'Alafin Mina Al-Mala'ikati Munzalina
Bala 'In Tasbiru Wa Tattaqu Wa Ya'tukum Min Fawrihim Hadha Yumdidkum Rabbukum Bikhamsati 'Alafin Mina Al-Mala'ikati Musawwimina
Wa Ma Ja`alahu Allahu 'Illa Bushra Lakum Wa Litatma'inna Qulubukum Bihi Wa Ma An-Nasru 'Illa Min `Indi Allahi Al-`Azizi Al-Hakimi
Liyaqta`a Tarafaan Mina Al-Ladhina Kafaru 'Aw Yakbitahum Fayanqalibu Kha'ibina
Laysa Laka Mina Al-'Amri Shay'un 'Aw Yatuba `Alayhim 'Aw Yu`adhibahum Fa'innahum Zalimuna
Wa Lillahi Ma Fi As-Samawati Wa Ma Fi Al-'ArÄ‘i Yaghfiru Liman Yasha'u Wa Yu`adhibu Man Yasha'u Wa Allahu Ghafurun Rahimun
